body:
Im leaving, most of the people won't even care, because i lost all my friends on this server and everything left is bad staff and a boring community... in my opinion.
this will be my last post i don't care who reads it, i don't care who dislikes it, i simply don't care any more about this server and community.
F*ck you all! (staff)

title: Cya Avicus.

replies.body:
Poor choices are at your poor faults. You're not entitled to this server, it's a privilege and not a right. Considering your last infractions, kindly move over to "Appeal an Infraction" and be nice on the forums, and don't make topics "aimed at staff members".

Would you like some fries with that month ban? Seems like you're salty enough to want a supersize...
